TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program, Ion Drive part 2" [Video with Commentary]

Articles.Content:
Hey all this video here is part 2 of the video where I got into orbit around Mun with just a Ion drive, this short video I talk about my experience trying to land.

hope everyone likes it, and you find it helpful. =)

also please leave a comment below, let me know what you would like to see me do a video of, ether a tutorial, or crazy rocket designs.

~Thanks~
